meta.name: Auto-Save Instagram Leads to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
ðŸ“‹ **SETUP REQUIRED:**

1. **Create Google Sheet:**
   - Make new sheet with these column headers:
   - A1: Name | B1: Email | C1: Phone
   - D1: Message | E1: Source | F1: Date

2. **Get Sheet ID:**
   - Copy from URL: docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/[SHEET_ID]/edit
   - Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID in Google Sheets node

3. **Connect Instagram Form:**
   - Use webhook URL from this node
   - Form fields: name, email, phone, message
